# lightstep_stream (Data Source)

Use this data source to retrieve information about an existing stream for use in other resources.



<!-- schema generated by tfplugindocs -->
## Schema

### Required

- **project_name** (String)
- **steam_id** (String)

### Read-Only

- **stream_query** (String) Stream query
- **stream_name** (String)
